author: HR Manager
content: Initial screening call completed. Candidate shows strong communication skills and relevant experience. Recommended for technical interview.

author: Recruiter
content: Follow-up email sent regarding next steps. Candidate responded promptly and shows enthusiasm for the role.

author: Technical Lead
content: Reviewed portfolio and previous work samples. Technical skills align well with our requirements. Scheduling technical assessment.

author: HR Manager
content: Reference check completed with previous employer. Received positive feedback regarding work quality and reliability.

author: Recruiter
content: Candidate accepted the offer. Starting paperwork process and scheduling onboarding session.

author: Team Lead
content: Interview conducted via video call. Candidate demonstrated good problem-solving skills but needs improvement in specific software knowledge.
